title: Sensex, Nifty Slip As Bajaj Finance Weighs; State-Run Banks Climb - NDTV Profit
content: Sensex, Nifty Slip As Bajaj Finance Weighs; State-Run Banks Climb  NDTV Profit
description: Indian stock indices inched lower on Monday, weighed down by financials and auto stocks, while state-owned lenders pushed higher after a batch of strong quarterly results.
